name: Super Aleksandr Jones Remastered
description:
Take control of Aleksandr, a man desperate to prove his theory about the flat Earth. Use your platforming skills in this absolutely brutal platformer.

Versions-

Version 1.0 (August 31, 2020)-Launch

Controls-

A/Left Arrow to move left

D/Right Arrow to move right

R to reload the level

explanation:

One year ago (August 31, 2019), I released my first game, Super Aleksandr Jones and the Round World. I made it in about 3 hours and submitted it to the Community Game Jam 2019. The game was pretty bad, but whatever. It has now been 1 year since I released, so I decided to remake the game in less than 1 hour. This build is the result of that. I remade the character, and added a new animation to it. So this build is closer to the original idea that I had when I originally thought of the game (all of the ideas for the original game were ironed out in less than a minute). So to do this, I reused a couple assets: 2 NPC sprites, 2 text assets, 1 crate sprite, and 1 cloud sprite, and the music. The rest of it I made within the time limits. That is all.

All assets (music, art, etc) were made by Black Frog Studios.
